text: Johnny Tadlock is an American politician who serves as a Republican member of the Oklahoma House of Representatives from the 1st district, which includes most of McCurtain county. Prior to running for state legislature, Tadlock served as sheriff of McCurtain County since 2005.Oklahoma Sheriff's Association Profile, accessed November 9, 2014 Tadlock defeated Kent Hendon in the Democratic primary election on June 24, 2014. The general election was held on November 4, 2014, with Tadlock winning over Republican candidate J.P. Longacre. In 2018, he switched his party affiliation from Democratic to Republican.http://city-sentinel.com/2018/12/as-democratic-rural-losses- increase-state-rep-tadlock-says-he-is-changing-parties-not-changing-sides/ ==See also== * List of American politicians who switched parties in office ==References== Category:Living people Category:Oklahoma sheriffs Category:Members of the Oklahoma House of Representatives Category:Oklahoma Democrats Category:People from Idabel, Oklahoma Category:21st-century American politicians Category:Oklahoma Republicans Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Johnny Tadlock
